query.name: stats
query.comment: Some statistics about tickets associated to a project
query.sql: SELECT ticket.status, ticket.ticket_type, ticket.priority, COUNT(ticket.id), SUM(ticket.duration), SUM(ROUND(ticket.duration * ticket.progress / 100)), SUM(ROUND((ticket.duration * (100 - ticket.progress)) / 100)) FROM jason_ticket AS ticket INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = :project_id AND acl.entity_type = :project_table AND acl.user_id = :user_id WHERE ticket.project_id = :project_id GROUP BY ticket.status, ticket.ticket_type, ticket.priority
